long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can use this extension to place Chrome OS windows on your screen (left, right, top, or down) using keyboard shortcuts.

Keyboard shortcuts can be specified at chrome://extensions/shortcuts
Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wQelRJ_Xhug
Github: https://github.com/kkimdev/chrome-window-extensions
